content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I understand that you are looking for a place to stay in Munich and I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm looking for the lowest price possible. I am a student and I want to be responsible and dependable. I would like to be on good terms with my landlord.

My budget is 300 Euros per month.

I would like to negotiate with you to see if we can come to an agreement on the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
I see, thank you for letting me know your budget and your willingness to negotiate. I understand that you are a student and looking for a responsible and dependable place to stay.

As a landlord, I would like to ensure that my property is rented out at the highest possible price. However, I am willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Based on the size of the apartment and your budget, I would like to propose a rental price of 350 Euros per month. This price is competitive in the Munich housing market and takes into account the costs of utilities and maintenance.

I hope that this proposal is within your budget and that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month. Please provide me with the lease agreement.

I would like to move in on the 1st of July.

Can you please confirm the move-in date?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content:
I'm glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 350 Euros per month. I will prepare the lease agreement for you and send it to your email address as soon as possible.

Regarding the move-in date, I can confirm that you can move in on the 1st of July. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
